__e: Uh, I'm doing some real estate work with Mr. Boyd... and, well, it turns out, the poor guy doesn't know a soul in town.
I took your sister to get her costume, and she didn't want to get a costume, so I bought Boyd something, and he looked really cute in that, and I wanted to show him off... (Sighs)
There's Boyd, and it's really expensive, and I don't even know if I deserve a second chance. Kristin.
How do you think it is that Boyd has such a good handle On what you've got and where you've got it?
I need to know what Boyd said when you told him about me and Jesse.
- He was getting better, and Mr. Boyd-
I mean, Boyd's at PD, but I don't think it's such a good idea to let Mac in that interrogation room just yet.
But if Boyd's still alive, we have to do something.
Are you telling me the man that is responsible For my partner's death is still alive?
